full_text: If you’re a big fan of @kiss and @RockAndBrews check out the grand opening of #RockNBrewsCasinoBraman in Braman, OK as the powerful & legendary @genesimmons @PaulStanleyLive will be making an appearance on May 10th.  I’m so pumped!!! https://t.co/xtY0adW6he

If you like overpriced Mexican food w/poor quality then your place is @Tacos4LifeGrill in Bixby, OK. I don’t know how this place stays open as the last two times have been horrific. Their chicken quesadillas are overfilled with chicken & cheese. 60 bucks down the drain. https://t.co/mWnZ6yBKgB
